To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private DarkCloudCover _darkcloudcover;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_darkcloudcover = DarkCloudCover(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_darkcloudcover.IsReady)
{
    var period = _darkcloudcover.Period.Value;
    var current = _darkcloudcover.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.darkcloudcover = self.DarkCloudCover(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.darkcloudcover.IsReady:
    period = self.darkcloudcover.Period.Value
    current = self.darkcloudcover.Current.Value
